resources.string:
Ask a question, click "NEW CARDS", and see what awaits you. Here are the basics: 
Majors take precedence over Minors, higher numbers take precedence over lower, and the suits in order of importance are Swords(physical), Wands(mental), Cups(social), and Coins/Pentacles(emotional/wealth). 

Card data was obtained through GitHub user ekelen (https://github.com/ekelen/tarot-api). 

Images were obtained through sacred-texts (http://www.sacred-texts.com/tarot/pkt/index.htm). 


Thank you for using my app!
